name: Upwards Of 20
description:
Upward Of 20 is a difficult vertical platforming game where you complete 5 levels in a run trying to get the fastest time possible!

This game was made for the game maker 20th aniversary jam!

Keys:
W- Jump
A & D - Move
(GamePad Is Supported!)

How I stuck to the theme of '20':
Every 20 seconds you get a double jump
Each Level is 20M high.
